title: Kacey a Rioter?
body:
I click on the "First Rioter comment which is **[this link](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/BJM3t6VT-making-league-more-female-friendly?show=flat&comment=000900000000000000010000)** and it send me to one of Kacey's posts. o.O

Click if you don't believe me.
